name: Gitea
description: Lightweight, self-hosted Git service written in Go. Minimal resource requirements.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  gitea:
    image: gitea/gitea:latest
    container_name: gitea
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      - USER_UID={{USER_UID}}
      - USER_GID={{USER_GID}}
      - GITEA__database__DB_TYPE=sqlite3
      - GITEA__server__DOMAIN=localhost
      - GITEA__server__ROOT_URL=http://localhost:{{GITEA_PORT}}
    ports:
      - "{{GITEA_PORT}}:3000"
      - "{{GITEA_SSH_PORT}}:22"
    volumes:
      - {{DATA_PATH}}:/data
      - /etc/timezone:/etc/timezone:ro
      - /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=gitea"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=development"

notes: Much lighter than GitLab, perfect for small teams
First user registered becomes the admin
